title: LF DUO GOLD+
body:
HI I'm looking for somone to climb in Dynamic que with preferably a adc but open to all

Please Be:
Kind (non toxic)
Don't rage at me or other team mates
Understand not every single game can be won
Have some decent game knowledge
Be able to critique me and yourself in a constructive manner
able to have a laugh
Have Skype or Discord

MY IGN is: Weaterarachelz
Aiming for plat at first then see how far we can push
Looking forwards to hearing from you

replies.body: i'm somewhat interested in this, i'm an adc main (kind of tilted atm) my rank is gold 5. if you're interested add me on league - wako487
